name: snack
description: A minimal CSS framework for web.
author: nzbin <nzb329@163.com>

scripts.build: run-s clean sass sass:theme docs autoprefixer
scripts.sass: node-sass --output-style expanded src/snack.scss dist/snack.css && node-sass --output-style compressed src/snack.scss dist/snack.min.css
scripts.sass:theme: node-sass --output-style expanded src/themes/snack-themes.scss dist/snack-themes.css && node-sass --output-style compressed src/themes/snack-themes.scss dist/snack-themes.min.css
